episodes.title: Jaggi Vasudev's (who calls himself Sadhguru)  Victims
episodes.description:
Google or search on Youtube: "Margaret Siinger-what is a cult and how does it work". Surprisingly everything that Singer said many years ago about cults fits Sadguru Jaggi Vasudev and his Isha.
Dr. Singer’s 6 conditions for a thought reform environment:
1) Deception: Keeping the person unaware of the hidden agenda in order to control and change the person.
The person must nbe unaware that the management is changing his/her behavior

2) Destabilization:  Controlling the person’s physical environment and “thinking time”
3) Dependency and Dread: Creating a sense of powerlessness, anxiety and fear in the person.
4)Disconnection: Suppressing old behavior and attitudes
5) Developing the cult Pseudopersonality: Eliciting new behavior and attitudes.
6)Denial and dedication: Maintaining a closed system of logic and restricting criticism.

episodes.title: Victim #3: Jaggi Vasudev's (Sadhguru) Victims
episodes.description:
I am an Indian woman. I was born in India and grew up in the USA. I meditated regularly even before Isha Yoga.Isha Yoga is not just a money scam although that is a part of it certainly.

 For the longest time I just believed I was the one with the problem in Isha and that I needed more yoga. Please post your testimonials in Cult Victim Union, you will save lives.

episodes.title: Victim # 2 : Isha's Death trap: Young Man died in Isha Yoga Thirtha Pool ; Mother devastated.
episodes.description:
Jaggi Vasudev (who likes to call himself Sadhguru , the true Guru) created this death trap.

 Excerpt from him, " There is a mercury lingam in the Theerthakund. The Rasalinga is made of solidified mercury which is 99.8% pure mercury. This is generally considered 100%. There are only 0.2 % of impurities which could not be taken out. Generally, according to the principles of modern chemistry, you cannot solidify mercury at room temperature. According to Western science, mercury can only be solidified below freezing point. Here, at normal room temperature, you see it is solidified in the linga form. This is an ancient science, an ancient Indian alchemy, through which mercury can be solidified at room temperature. And mercury is the heaviest substance on the planet. This Linga is just two feet tall, but it weighs 680 kgs. That's a lot of weight for an object of this size. The rock beneath, the avudayar, which is at least 5 or 6 times bigger than the lingam itself, probably weighs just about 150 kgs or maybe 200 kgs, not more"
